content: उत्सवः [उद्-सू-अप्] {@--1@} A festival, joyous or festive occasion, jubilee; रत° <ls>Ś. 6. 19</ls>; तांडव° festive or joyous dance <ls>U. 3. 18</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 59.</ls> {@--2@} Joy, merriment, delight, pleasure; स कृत्वा विरतोत्सवान् <ls>R. 4. 78</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 10</ls>; <ls>Mv. 3. 41</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1. 23</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 61</ls>; पराभवोप्युत्सव एव मानिनां <ls>Ki. 1. 41.</ls> {@--3@} Height, elevation. {@--4@} Wrath. {@--5@} Wish, rising of a wish. {@--6@} A section of a book. {@--7@} Enterprise. {@--8@} An undertaking, begining.
